column4: Is there a way to set up ubuntu to check my e-mail in Evolution without having to have Evolution up?

notification, without evolution being up
right on.  I'm not sure Evolution is going to need to be used at all.  I can only imagine there would be other apps that can simply check for email and display a notification.
